messages.content: Thousands of us use Bury Walk-In Centre every month, saving NHS Bury millions of pounds. David Nuttall and the Tories will close Bury Walk-In Centre and have put Fairfield A&E at risk of closure. NHS figures show thousands more people would be sent to Fairfield A&E or your local GP surgery if it closes, putting even more pressure on already swamped services. David Nuttall didn’t fight for Fairfield Maternity Unit and he won’t fight for our Walk-In Centre or A&E. James Frith has made it his number one priority to keep our Walk-In Centre open and protect Fairfield A&E. If you want to keep A&E and the Walk-In Centre open, only a vote for James can make that happen.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: James Frith prioritizes keeping Bury Walk-In Centre open and protecting Fairfield A&E from closure.
